Action.description: The action taken on the encryption policy within a tenant. Possible values are: Added Removed Updated

ActionBy.description: This field is reserved for future use.

ActionDate.description: When the change to the tenant encryption policy status was made.

DetailIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for this detail record.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted. This field is unique within your organization.

MetricsType.description: The type of encryption policy collected by this metric.

Name.description: The name of the metric for the data collected.

PolicyStatus.description: Status of the policy. Possible values are: -1—No license. 0—Not Enabled. -1—Enabled

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant with Shield Encryption.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant that this record is for.
